page.title: 08RELIGIOUS WORSHIP-HEDNESFORD
page.content: There are a variety of Denominations of Christian Churches which include: Our Lady of Lourdes,which is a Roman Catholic Church,St.Peter's,St. Michael's,St.Saviour's,St.John's, Anglican,The United Trinity Church, which is joint Methodist and United Reform,Salvation Army,Bourne Methodist,Pentecostal.Sects are: Seventh Day Adventists,Jehovah's Witnesses,Mormons and Spritualists. Eric Prichard is Minister at The United Trinity Church where an annual meeting nominates representatives for the congregation on the church council. This years representatives are Susan Bradley,Christine Collins,Wendy Prichard and Steven Gooch.Overall, they are concerned about people,"We help others,but are ourselves helped by the sense of having done something about human needs." E. Prichard.
